title: Python Programming
description: Master Python programming from basics to advanced concepts
introduction: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its simplicity and versatility. It's widely used in web development, data science, artificial intelligence, and automation.

topics.name: Variables and Data Types
topics.description: Understanding Python's dynamic typing system and basic data types

topics.name: Control Flow
topics.description: If statements, loops, and conditional logic

topics.name: Functions
topics.description: Defining and using functions, lambda expressions, and decorators

topics.name: File Handling
topics.description: Reading and writing files, working with different file formats

topics.name: Exception Handling
topics.description: Try-except blocks, raising exceptions, and custom exceptions

topics.name: Modules and Packages
topics.description: Importing modules, creating packages, and virtual environments

topics.name: Data Structures
topics.description: Lists, tuples, dictionaries, sets, and their operations

concepts.name: List Comprehension
concepts.description: A concise way to create lists based on existing lists
concepts.example:
squares = [x**2 for x in range(10)]
print(squares)  # [0, 1, 4, 9, 16, 25, 36, 49, 64, 81]

concepts.name: Generators
concepts.description: Functions that return an iterator using yield keyword

concepts.name: Decorators
concepts.description: Functions that modify the behavior of other functions
concepts.example:
def timing_decorator(func):
    def wrapper(*args, **kwargs):
        import time
        start = time.time()
        result = func(*args, **kwargs)
        print(f'Time: {time.time() - start}')
        return result
    return wrapper

examples.description: Reading a file line by line
